thread.title: Score, Inc. Announces the Addition of Author Ash Maurya to the 2015 Credit Repair Summit Speaker Lineup
thread.title_full: Score, Inc. Announces the Addition of Author Ash Maurya to the 2015 Credit Repair Summit Speaker Lineup

author: Joel Pate
title: Score, Inc. Announces the Addition of Author Ash Maurya to the 2015 Credit Repair Summit Speaker Lineup
text:
Ash Maurya is known for offering some of the best and most practical business advice to entrepreneurs in many different industries. As author of the international best-seller “Running Lean: How to Iterate from Plan A to a Plan That Works”, Maurya is considered an expert at helping small businesses to grow and succeed. The 2015 Credit Repair Summit being held this year beginning on October 6th will be hosting a wide range of presenters, including Ash Maurya. Attendees to this year’s event will learn about how to grow their credit repair business using the unique and innovative techniques Maurya developed.
Having been featured in Inc. Magazine, Forbes, Fortune and other top business publications, Ash Maurya is a highly sought-after speaker on what it takes to start, develop and grow a successful company. Through a systematic methodology he pioneered, Ash Maurya teaches startups and established companies how to raise their odds of success by streamlining their business processes.
According to Joshua Carmona, co-founder of Score Inc. and sponsor of the 2015 Credit Repair Summit, “Ash Maurya is a truly innovative thought leader and business coach, with much to offer credit repair professionals in growing their businesses. We’re proud to have him in our lineup for this year’s Credit Repair Summit.”
Using the innovative yet straight-forward ideas first presented in his book, Ash will be teaching credit repair professionals and business owners how to develop a business plan that works for them.
About Ash Maurya
Ash Maurya is an entrepreneur, author, consultant and sought-after speaker on what it takes to succeed in starting and running a successful company. He has learned from some of the most respected names in the business, and regularly shares his pioneering thoughts and ideas with others. He has established, built and sold businesses, including WiredReach which he sold in late 2010. He is currently the founder and CEO of Spark59, a company with the mission to help startups increase their odds of success.
About the 2015 Credit Repair Summit
The annual Credit Repair Summit presented by Score, Inc. is a unique online symposium that brings together many of the industry’s top professionals in a valuable training setting. Beginning on October 6th this year, the 2015 Credit Repair Summit will allow attendees the opportunity to learn the latest trends, as well as where the industry is heading. Topics will include how to grow a successful business, dispute resolution, marketing, tips for increasing sales, new industry regulations, and much more. More information can be found here .
